data.text: Atuunchu eini rakip inngamna makheiya Pathian le kadik namin eii, halli eini rakip in 5:1: eini in nimu; eini'n nimu sik eii.ni Pumi Jisu Christa makheiya Pathian diang kadai kha-um nimujei.
Christa'n einihi ngamna jarra hiwa Pathian riangwai hin anaheiruoi, halli tuun hiwahin eini'n niring, 5:2: in orrui, eini in orrui halli eini'n Pathian lurlianna ngamna khan eini'n nin-or eii!
Halli hiwabit ema-ah 5:3: eini innum in orrui. eini'n nipoong niraal kaalla-um rokrui, ajarchu kapoong karaal in deimatorna anapei,
deimatorna'n Pathian zootna kha aheichoi halli ama zootna'n inngamna kha aheichoi.
Hiwa inngamna'n einidiang jakna naminmumak, ajarchu einidiang inapeii Ratha Inthiang makheiya eini malung suungnga Pathian minriang nakha anapeii.
Tichu eini'n thodan aleiommaklai khan, Christa'n aphakacha-ah Pathian kajetmakngai sik-ah anathipi.
Han miring inkhat in mikadik inkhatsik-ah kathimatorhi kawaangthei eii, khawakha e-innum katha katho miring inkhatsik-ah atu ka-ang inkhat in thipi mator kacha aom.
Pathian in angtuk naminriangme tikha hinthoa naminmujei khawa khachu eini'n manu karoon nilei elai Christa'n eini sik ah nathipijei.

Khawajarra Christa thisen 5:9: Ama thisen khan, Ama inpeisuok na thina khan.khan eini-ngai rakip atuunchu Pathian le kadik namin ejei, khawajarra eini ngai rakip Christa'n kheel kheella Pathian raangna makheiya anasan sikjei!

Halli eini ngai rakip Pathian inhalpui mi nilei eii, takkha Pathian Sapa'n nathipi jarra eini rakip Pathian le inngeina nineinook jei, halli i-naminngei dungjuiya Christa ringkhuo ah eini ngaihi angtuk inkheella ringna naminmu sikme!
Hiwabit ema ah, eini ngai rakip Pumi Jisu Christa makheiya Pathian diang rokna ninei. Ajarchu ama jarra eini rakip tuunchu inngeitheina nimujei.
Khawale inruoiya manu hi manmasituolla miring inkhat diang makheiya aheiluut, halli ama manu khan kathi aheichooi, ajarchu mi rakip manu inroon jarra, mi rakipdiang thina atungjei. Inphut 3:6
Khale inruoiya Dan hi napema-ah manu hi manmasituolla aleiom, takkha Dan leiom maklaichu manu hi anemna leimin-ommu.
Takkha Adam pha makheiya Moses pha katung mi rakip chungnga thina'n wai aleiroon, khat-um Adam in Pathian chongpeii ijuimak angnga manu kathomak ngaidiang-um manu'n wai aleiroon.

Takkha hiwa inni hi in-ang ripmu, ajarchu Pathian manboi kutchoi chu Adam manu ka-ang emak. Akadik kha eii, miring inkhat manu jarra miring angjet thina innei. Takkha Pathian riangwai hichu kalokdoom kha eii, halli Jisu Christa bit-in amankaboi Pathian riangwai kutchoi kha mi angjet diang apeii.

Halli Pathian manboi kutchoi li Adam manu hi inteina aom. Adam itho manu kha'n “Kathamak” chongtanna kha aheichoi, takkha manu angjet nileitho innum Pathian riangwai kutchoi khan eini ngaihi ama diang kadik mi namin eii.

Miring inkhat manu thojarra thina khan wai aroon, ajarchu khawa miring inkhat manu thojarra eii. Takkha Jisu Christa! miring inkhat bit in angme i-naleithopi chuonthoman kha angtuk kalokme, Pathian riangwai lokna khat-um amale leilamma kadik imin-ejei kamu inmani rakip in, Christa le inringkhuo ah wai inroonsik eii.
Khale inruoiya miring inkhat manu thojarra mi rakip manu katho amin eii, hiwale in-ang rip-ah miring inkhat kadik thojarra mi rakip kadik min-ena anei halli inmani diang ringna apeii.
Khat-um miring inkhat chongjuimak jarra mi rakip manu karoon amin eii, hiwale in-ang rip-ah miring inkhat chongjui jarra Pathian in mi angjet akadik amin esik eii.
Kadikmak katho insoonna sik-ah Dan hi aleibool, takkha manu insoon nakhan, Pathian riangwai kha-um kheella insoon sik eii.
Khawajarra, manu'n thina sik-ah wai aroon, halli Pathian riangwai'n kadik enasik-ah wai aroon, halli Jisu Christa eini Pumi jarra eini rakip hektik kaboi ringkhuo muna sik-ah lam nakeiruoi.
